name: Merb
text: = Merb = At the time of writing, Merb 1.0.10 has been released. Execute the following: jgem install merb-core merb-more There're currently Active Record and Sequel ORMs working properly with Merb. Both will require additional jdbc drivers (jgem install postgres-pr for PostgreSQL driver). [[DataMapper]] support is in development. You can also [[MerbDebuggingWithNetbeans6_5|Debug Merb Application with Netbeans]].
